review: Love it so far. The remote is simple and easy to navigate. Will be using this mostly for Netflix. I don't think there is a YouTube app, but hopefully that'll change soon. Then it'll be really awesome!
author: J. Cain

review: Will not connect to my wifi.  I have tried two different Fire Sticks (I returned the first when I had trouble, and got a replacement).  Neither was able to connect to my wifi.I really wanted this to work.  So i spent a lot of time following the online troubleshooting steps, and working with phone and email tech support guidance.  Given that various other devices (both mine and those of houseguests) connect easily to my wifi, I conclude that a design flaw exists that prevents the Fire Stick from connecting with certain wifi networks.So, probably a great product if it works with your wifi; useless if it does not.
